sentence.Network_en: A case of reticulate pigmented anomaly of the flexures is reported.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin reticulatus 'reticulated', from reticulum (see reticulum)

means.word_mean: 1. form a net or a network
2. distribute by a network, as of water or electricity
3. divide so as to form a network
